45 bgpstream_elem_t *bgpstream_elem_create() {
46  // allocate memory for new element
47  bgpstream_elem_t * ri;
48 
49  if((ri =
50  (bgpstream_elem_t *) malloc_zero(sizeof(bgpstream_elem_t))) == NULL) {
51  return NULL;
52  }
53  // all fields are initialized to zero
54 
55  // need to create as path
56  if((ri->aspath = bgpstream_as_path_create()) == NULL) {
57  return NULL;
58  }
59 
60  return ri;
61 }
62 
63 void bgpstream_elem_destroy(bgpstream_elem_t *elem) {
64 
65  if(elem == NULL) {
66  return;
67  }
68 
69  bgpstream_as_path_destroy(elem->aspath);
70  elem->aspath = NULL;
71 
72  free(elem);
73 }
74 
75 void bgpstream_elem_clear(bgpstream_elem_t *elem) {
76  bgpstream_as_path_clear(elem->aspath);
77 }
78 
79 bgpstream_elem_t *bgpstream_elem_copy(bgpstream_elem_t *dst,
80  bgpstream_elem_t *src)
81 {
82  /* save all ptrs before memcpy */
83  bgpstream_as_path_t *dst_aspath = dst->aspath;
84 
85  /* do a memcpy and then manually copy the as path */
86  memcpy(dst, src, sizeof(bgpstream_elem_t));
87 
88  /* restore all ptrs */
89  dst->aspath = dst_aspath;
90 
91  if(bgpstream_as_path_copy(dst->aspath, src->aspath) != 0)
92  {
93  return NULL;
94  }
95 
96  return dst;
97 }
98 
99 
100 int bgpstream_elem_type_snprintf(char *buf, size_t len,
101  bgpstream_elem_type_t type)
102 {
103  /* ensure we have enough bytes to write our single character */
104  if(len == 0) {
105  return 1;
106  } else if(len == 1) {
107  buf[0] = '\0';
108  return 1;
109  }
110 
111  switch(type)
112  {
113  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_TYPE_RIB:
114  buf[0] = 'R';
115  break;
116 
117  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_TYPE_ANNOUNCEMENT:
118  buf[0] = 'A';
119  break;
120 
121  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_TYPE_WITHDRAWAL:
122  buf[0] = 'W';
123  break;
124 
125  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_TYPE_PEERSTATE:
126  buf[0] = 'S';
127  break;
128 
129  default:
130  buf[0] = '\0';
131  break;
132  }
133 
134  buf[1] = '\0';
135  return 1;
136 }
137 
138 int bgpstream_elem_peerstate_snprintf(char *buf, size_t len,
139  bgpstream_elem_peerstate_t state)
140 {
141  size_t written = 0;
142 
143  switch(state)
144  {
145  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_PEERSTATE_IDLE:
146  strncpy(buf, "IDLE", len);
147  written = strlen("IDLE");
148  break;
149 
150  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_PEERSTATE_CONNECT:
151  strncpy(buf, "CONNECT", len);
152  written = strlen("CONNECT");
153  break;
154 
155  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_PEERSTATE_ACTIVE:
156  strncpy(buf, "ACTIVE", len);
157  written = strlen("ACTIVE");
158  break;
159 
160  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_PEERSTATE_OPENSENT:
161  strncpy(buf, "OPENSENT", len);
162  written = strlen("OPENSENT");
163  break;
164 
165  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_PEERSTATE_OPENCONFIRM:
166  strncpy(buf, "OPENCONFIRM", len);
167  written = strlen("OPENCONFIRM");
168  break;
169 
170  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_PEERSTATE_ESTABLISHED:
171  strncpy(buf, "ESTABLISHED", len);
172  written = strlen("ESTABLISHED");
173  break;
174 
175  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_PEERSTATE_CLEARING:
176  strncpy(buf, "CLEARING", len);
177  written = strlen("CLEARING");
178  break;
179 
180  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_PEERSTATE_DELETED:
181  strncpy(buf, "DELETED", len);
182  written = strlen("DELETED");
183  break;
184 
185  default:
186  if(len > 0) {
187  buf[0] = '\0';
188  }
189  break;
190  }
191 
192  /* we promise to always nul-terminate */
193  if(written > len) {
194  buf[len-1] = '\0';
195  }
196 
197  return written;
198 }
199 
200 #define B_REMAIN (len-written)
201 #define B_FULL (written >= len)
202 #define ADD_PIPE \
203  do { \
204  if(B_REMAIN > 1) \
205  { \
206  *buf_p = '|'; \
207  buf_p++; \
208  *buf_p = '\0'; \
209  written++; \
210  } \
211  else \
212  { \
213  return NULL; \
214  } \
215  } while(0)
216 
217 #define SEEK_STR_END \
218  do { \
219  while(*buf_p != '\0') \
220  { \
221  written++; \
222  buf_p++; \
223  } \
224  } while(0)
225 
226 char *bgpstream_elem_snprintf(char *buf, size_t len,
227  bgpstream_elem_t *elem)
228 {
229  assert(elem);
230 
231  size_t written = 0; /* < how many bytes we wanted to write */
232  size_t c = 0; /* < how many chars were written */
233  char *buf_p = buf;
234 
235  bgpstream_as_path_seg_t *seg;
236 
237  /* common fields */
238 
239  // timestamp|peer_ip|peer_asn|message_type|
240 
241  /* TIMESTAMP */
242  c = snprintf(buf_p, B_REMAIN, "%"PRIu32"|", elem->timestamp);
243  written += c;
244  buf_p += c;
245 
246  if(B_FULL)
247  return NULL;
248 
249  /* PEER IP */
250  if(bgpstream_addr_ntop(buf_p, B_REMAIN, &elem->peer_address) == NULL)
251  return NULL;
252  SEEK_STR_END;
253 
254  /* PEER ASN */
255  c = snprintf(buf_p, B_REMAIN, "|%"PRIu32"|", elem->peer_asnumber);
256  written += c;
257  buf_p += c;
258 
259  if(B_FULL)
260  return NULL;
261 
262  /* MESSAGE TYPE */
263  c = bgpstream_elem_type_snprintf(buf_p, B_REMAIN, elem->type);
264  written += c;
265  buf_p += c;
266 
267  if(B_FULL)
268  return NULL;
269 
270  ADD_PIPE;
271 
272  /* conditional fields */
273  switch(elem->type)
274  {
275  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_TYPE_RIB:
276  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_TYPE_ANNOUNCEMENT:
277 
278  /* PREFIX */
279  if(bgpstream_pfx_snprintf(buf_p, B_REMAIN,
280  (bgpstream_pfx_t*)&(elem->prefix)) == NULL)
281  {
282  return NULL;
283  }
284  SEEK_STR_END;
285  ADD_PIPE;
286 
287  /* NEXT HOP */
288  if(bgpstream_addr_ntop(buf_p, B_REMAIN, &elem->nexthop) == NULL)
289  {
290  return NULL;
291  }
292  SEEK_STR_END;
293  ADD_PIPE;
294 
295  /* AS PATH */
296  c = bgpstream_as_path_snprintf(buf_p, B_REMAIN, elem->aspath);
297  written += c;
298  buf_p += c;
299 
300  if(B_FULL)
301  return NULL;
302 
303  ADD_PIPE;
304 
305  /* ORIGIN AS */
306  if((seg = bgpstream_as_path_get_origin_seg(elem->aspath)) != NULL)
307  {
308  c = bgpstream_as_path_seg_snprintf(buf_p, B_REMAIN, seg);
309  written += c;
310  buf_p += c;
311  }
312 
313  ADD_PIPE;
314 
315  /* OLD STATE (empty) */
316  ADD_PIPE;
317 
318  /* NEW STATE (empty) */
319  if(B_FULL)
320  return NULL;
321 
322  /* END OF LINE */
323  break;
324 
325  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_TYPE_WITHDRAWAL:
326 
327  /* PREFIX */
328  if(bgpstream_pfx_snprintf(buf_p, B_REMAIN,
329  (bgpstream_pfx_t*)&(elem->prefix)) == NULL)
330  {
331  return NULL;
332  }
333  SEEK_STR_END;
334  ADD_PIPE;
335  /* NEXT HOP (empty) */
336  ADD_PIPE;
337  /* AS PATH (empty) */
338  ADD_PIPE;
339  /* ORIGIN AS (empty) */
340  ADD_PIPE;
341  /* OLD STATE (empty) */
342  ADD_PIPE;
343  /* NEW STATE (empty) */
344  if(B_FULL)
345  return NULL;
346  /* END OF LINE */
347  break;
348 
349  case BGPSTREAM_ELEM_TYPE_PEERSTATE:
350 
351  /* PREFIX (empty) */
352  ADD_PIPE;
353  /* NEXT HOP (empty) */
354  ADD_PIPE;
355  /* AS PATH (empty) */
356  ADD_PIPE;
357  /* ORIGIN AS (empty) */
358  ADD_PIPE;
359 
360  /* OLD STATE */
361  c = bgpstream_elem_peerstate_snprintf(buf_p, B_REMAIN,
362  elem->old_state);
363  written += c;
364  buf_p += c;
365 
366  if(B_FULL)
367  return NULL;
368 
369  ADD_PIPE;
370 
371  /* NEW STATE (empty) */
372  c = bgpstream_elem_peerstate_snprintf(buf_p, B_REMAIN, elem->new_state);
373  written += c;
374  buf_p += c;
375 
376  if(B_FULL)
377  return NULL;
378  /* END OF LINE */
379  break;
380 
381  default:
382  fprintf(stderr, "Error during elem processing\n");
383  return NULL;
384  }
385 
386  return buf;
387 }
